message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it would be a valuable addition for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Could you meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.
